items.content_html: The GitHub Code Search App is a Flask-based web application that enables users to search for code snippets on GitHub. Powered by the GitHub API, this lightweight tool provides a seamless interface for developers to discover code repositories efficiently.
items.title: BaranDev/Search-Code-using-Github-API: The GitHub Code Search App is a Flask-based web application that enables users to search for code snippets on GitHub. Powered by the GitHub API, this lightweight tool provides a seamless interface for developers to discover code repositories efficiently.
